message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence and functionality. Given its unique features and the quality of materials used, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $12000. This generous offer allows you to experience the unparalleled quality and craftsmanship firsthand while securing a significant value compared to the market rate. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and needs. Looking forward to your positive response.
